forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 4pm. Partly sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 5 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As Boston slips into the cool embrace of night, a gentle whisper of a breeze carries the promise of change. The skies hover partly cloudy, with certainty lingering just above the 53-degree threshold. The evening feels tranquil, punctuated only by the soft rustling of leaves and the distant hum of the city that never sleeps. The air is mild yet carries a hint of warmth, inviting those out for a late stroll or an impromptu chat under the stars.

Looking ahead to the day in store, one can sense a touch of ambivalence. While the morning may dawn only partly sunny, hints of rain may flutter in after the workday begins to fade at around 4 PM. Anticipate a soothing warmth, as the afternoon climbs to approximately 72 degrees before retracing its steps into the 60s. Dress accordingly: a light layer to ward off the morning chill, perhaps with the foresight of a light raincoat should you find yourself swept up in the rhythm of raindrops come evening. Embrace the city’s vibrant pulse by exploring a local café or perusing hidden bookstores as the clouds play their game of peek-a-boo. Whatever you choose, it promises to be a day that reminds you of the subtle beauty of transition.
